channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Printer LJ4010DN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Printer LJ4010DN

item.title: CVE-2020-8330|2024-08-04T09:56:28.302Z -- lenovo -- printer%20lj4010dn
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in the firmware prior to version 1.01 used in Lenovo Printer LJ4010DN that could be triggered by a remote user sending a crafted packet to the device, preventing subsequent print jobs until the printer is rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2020-8329|2024-08-04T09:56:28.339Z -- lenovo -- printer%20lj4010dn
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in the firmware prior to version 1.01 used in Lenovo Printer LJ4010DN that could be triggered by a remote user sending a crafted packet to the device, causing an error to be displayed and preventing printer from functioning until the printer is rebooted.
